list_definition.definition: the opening in the head by which a human or animal eats and speaks or makes noises

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What has the baby got in its mouth?

list_definition.definition: the opening or entrance eg of a bottle, river etc
to move the lips as if forming (words), but without making any sound

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He mouthed the words to me so that no-one could overhear.
